articles.title: After Going ‘Free of L.G.B.T.,’ a Polish Town Pays a Price - The New York Times
articles.description: Krasnik voted to be “free of L.G.B.T.” two years ago to satisfy conservative voters. Now, the mayor regrets the move, which has led to censure from other European countries and put funding at risk.
articles.content:
That will be an uphill struggle.
